mapper.select:
select count(1) from room
and room_name like CONCAT(#{param.cond.room.roomName},'%')
mapper.sql: id, room_name, cost, weixin_discount, discount_30, discount_90, discount_180, room_num
mapper.insert: insert into room (id, room_name, cost, weixin_discount, discount_30, discount_90, discount_180, room_num) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{weixinDiscount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount30,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount90,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount180,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into room
id,
room_name,
cost,
weixin_discount,
discount_30,
discount_90,
discount_180,
room_num,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{weixinDiscount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{discount30,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

mapper.update:
update room
room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
weixin_discount = #{weixinDiscount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
discount_30 = #{discount30,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
discount_90 = #{discount90,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
discount_180 = #{discount180,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update room set room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, weixin_discount = #{weixinDiscount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount_30 = #{discount30,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount_90 = #{discount90,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount_180 = #{discount180,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
